lines.english: Grá mo chroí, mo mhamaí, cé go raibh mé cineál scanraithe
lines.irish: Love of my heart, my mammy, even though I was kind of scared

lines.english: Nuair a tháinig sí abhaile ‘s an teach go hiomlán salach
lines.irish: When she came home and the house was completely dirty

lines.english: Níl mé ag iarraidh tabhairt amach, no, níl mé ag iarraidh troid anocht lad
lines.irish: I don't want to give out, no, I don't want to fight tonight lad

lines.english: Tá an cheann seo duitse, mo mhamaí cliste
lines.irish: This one's for you, my clever mammy

lines.english: Pasta pesto, prátaí rósta, teach go hiomlán focain reoite
lines.irish: Pasta pesto, roast potatoes, house completely fucking freezing

lines.english: Saoire fada ar an chósta 's cleachtadh ceol, I nearly lost it
lines.irish: Long holiday on the coast and music practice, I nearly lost it

lines.english: 'Cause níl faic níos crua de na single mas
lines.irish: 'Cause nothing's harder than single mas

lines.english: She'd knock the cunt out of any da, she'd break a jaw
lines.irish: She'd deck any dad, she'd break a jaw

lines.english: Dá mbeadh an gá, she'd go berzerk gan any fáth
lines.irish: If needed, she'd go berserk for no reason

lines.english: Like, "níor ghlan tú an focain leithreas i gceart, ye wee focan shite"
lines.irish: Like, "you didn't clean the fucking toilet properly, ye wee fucking shite"

lines.english: Foc, that's me gettin' bate again tonight, and then Dyrt goes...
lines.irish: Fuck, that's me getting a beating again tonight, and then Dyrt goes...

lines.english: Thank fuck mam's don't do a runner
lines.irish: Thank God mam's don't run away

lines.english: 'Cause some dads spend years buying butter
lines.irish: 'Cause some dads disappear for years 'buying butter'

lines.english: I just took another line with my brother
lines.irish: I just took another line with my brother

lines.english: So I want to tell my mam that I love her
lines.irish: So I want to tell my mam that I love her

lines.english: Seo ceann do na mná, a bhíonn ag obair gach lá
lines.irish: This one's for the women who work every day

lines.english: Ag cur iad féin i mbaol, oh, ar mhaithe lenár saoil
lines.irish: Putting themselves at risk, oh, for the sake of our lives

lines.english: Seo ceann do mo mhamaí, gan thú bheinn tanaí
lines.irish: This one's for my mammy, without you I'd be weak

lines.english: Gan thú bheinn a banaí, oh is grá liom thú a mamaí...
lines.irish: Without you I'd be a mess, oh I love you mammy...

lines.english: My father's child, my mother's son
lines.irish: Mac m'athar, mac mo mháthar

lines.english: That line can be troublesome
lines.irish: That line can be tricky

lines.english: Ah sure, what's done is done
lines.irish: Sure, what's done is done

lines.english: And my mother is a stubborn cunt
lines.irish: And my mother is a stubborn legend

lines.english: For a son, no needed assistance
lines.irish: For her son, she needed no help

lines.english: 'Twas Breda and Vincent 'til he flew off and left me in Breda's hands
lines.irish: It was Breda and Vincent until he left and Breda raised me

lines.english: 'Cause my father had Peter Pan syndrome symptoms
lines.irish: 'Cause my father had Peter Pan syndrome symptoms

lines.english: But I don't begrudge you Vince
lines.irish: But I hold no grudge Vince

lines.english: I'm sure that you loved your kids
lines.irish: I'm sure you loved your kids

lines.english: You just weren't able to be there enough because of trauma you suffer with, but fuck it, it's
lines.irish: You just couldn't be there much 'cause of your trauma, but fuck it, it's

lines.english: All in the past, it's all in the bag I haul on my back
lines.irish: All in the past, it's the burden I carry

lines.english: And never complained, it brought me the knack of knowing how trauma impacts
lines.irish: And I never complained – it taught me how trauma hits

lines.english: Kids are whacked-out without thought for their mam when she's giving them all that she can
lines.irish: Kids act out not thinking of their mam while she gives all she can

lines.english: Trapped in their self-centered thoughts about all that they lack because they're missing a bond with their dad
lines.irish: Trapped in their self-pity thinking about what they lack, 'cause of the missing dad bond

lines.english: But she played dad when the job was his, so I want to say thanks for all you did
lines.irish: But she was dad when he wasn't, so I want to thank you for all you did

lines.english: Every cloud, as they say, the problem is
lines.irish: Every cloud, as they say, but the problem is

lines.english: That's just another line that I'll probably sniff
lines.irish: That's just another line I'll probably sniff

lines.english: Seo ceann do na mná, a bhíonn ag obair gach lá
lines.irish: This one's for the women who work every day

lines.english: Ag cur iad féin i mbaol, oh, ar mhaithe lenár saoil
lines.irish: Putting themselves at risk, oh, for the sake of our lives

lines.english: Seo ceann do mo mhamaí, gan thú bheinn tanaí
lines.irish: This one's for my mammy, without you I'd be weak

lines.english: Gan thú bheinn a banaí, oh is grá liom thú a mamaí...
lines.irish: Without you I'd be a mess, oh I love you mammy...

lines.english: Is grá liom thú mamaí, a mhamaí, ye had me eating shite dinners like spuds and salami
lines.irish: I love you mammy, mammy, you had me eating awful dinners like spuds and salami

lines.english: Ach is cuimhin liom go minic bheadh braillín úr nuair a thiocfas mé abhaile ar mo leabaí
lines.irish: But I remember there'd always be a fresh sheet when I came home to bed

lines.english: Ar bith ar mé ag spraoi, since I fell out your gee
lines.irish: From the moment I was born, since I fell out your gee

lines.english: Ní minic a bhfeicfinn tú i do shuí
lines.irish: I rarely saw you sitting down

lines.english: Mo mhamaí, mo laoch, táim buíoch duit mar bhí
lines.irish: My mammy, my hero, I'm thankful to you because there was

lines.english: I gcónaí bia ar mo phláta, calling me do wee ghrása
lines.irish: Always food on my plate, calling me your wee darling

lines.english: And you never went mad, whenever I had a cóisir i do theach
lines.irish: And you never went mad when I had parties in your house

lines.english: Is mó an bhuíochas leatsa, mo mháthair croíúil snasta
lines.irish: All my thanks to you, my kind, smart mammy

lines.english: As mo bheatha, cuimhní sásta, and slapping me when you had to
lines.irish: For my life, happy memories, and slapping me when needed

lines.english: Seo ceann do na mná, a bhíonn ag obair gach lá
lines.irish: This one's for the women who work every day

lines.english: Ag cur iad féin i mbaol, oh, ar mhaithe lenár saoil
lines.irish: Putting themselves at risk, oh, for the sake of our lives

lines.english: Seo ceann do mo mhamaí, gan thú bheinn tanaí
lines.irish: This one's for my mammy, without you I'd be weak

lines.english: Gan thú bheinn a banaí, oh is grá liom thú a mamaí...
lines.irish: Without you I'd be a mess, oh I love you mammy...
